title: Analytics Dashboard UI
description:
Create Comprehensive Analytics Dashboard

Build a full-featured analytics dashboard that displays key business metrics through interactive charts and visualizations, with the ability to drill down into detailed data views.

Requirements:
- Design and implement the main dashboard layout with responsive grid system
- Integrate charting library (e.g., Chart.js, D3.js, Recharts) for data visualizations
- Display primary KPIs in prominent card/widget format with current values and trends
- Include multiple chart types: line charts for trends, bar charts for comparisons, pie/donut charts for distributions
- Implement drill-down functionality allowing users to click charts/metrics to view detailed breakdowns
- Add date range selector to filter data by custom time periods
- Implement data fetching from backend APIs with loading states and error handling
- Add export functionality for charts and data (PDF, CSV, or PNG)
- Ensure dashboard updates dynamically when filters are applied
- Optimize for performance with large datasets (pagination, virtualization, or data aggregation)
- Make dashboard fully responsive across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices

Technical Considerations:
- Define which specific KPIs and metrics to track
- Determine data refresh frequency (real-time, polling, or manual refresh)
- Plan data structure and API endpoints needed
- Consider caching strategy for dashboard data
- Implement proper error boundaries for chart rendering failures
- Add skeleton loaders or placeholders during data fetching
